      #parse("oetinvest/header.vm")

<h1>Introduction</h1>

<p>This is an experiment about incentivised economic decision-making. 
This means that you will earn real money through your participation in this experiment,
and your payment will depend on your decisions.
Please follow the instructions carefully. If you have a question, please raise
your hand. An experiment administrator will come to you.</p>

<p>If you are morally opposed to gambling or have strong feelings against 
motor sport, please raise your hand, as both are integral parts of this experiment.  
During the experiment, any talking or other communication between
participants is forbidden.  Please TURN OFF your mobile phone and 
other electronic devices now.</p>

<p>You will make decisions during this experiment by entering information into 
text boxes that appear on the screen.  
After you have entered each decision, please press the button at the bottom of 
the screen to proceed to the next screen.</p>
  
<p> Your decisions in this experiment are anonymous, and you are identified solely by your
participant number. The payment you will receive at the end of the experiment will 
be kept confidential from all other participants.</p>

<p>This experiment will proceed in several stages. You will receive instructions for each 
stage on the screen before the stage begins. In some stages you will need to use headphones, 
but please don't put them on yet.  You will be informed when it is time to use them. You will be doing the following things, in this order:</p>

<ul>
<li> Answer a few questions about yourself.</li>
<li> Participate in a 5-minute relaxation exercise.</li>
<li> Engage in a task, during which you will earn money.  
You will use this money later in the experiment.</li>
<li> Pay attention to step-by-step instructions in how to bet and invest in a car race game.</li>
<li> Participate in six (6) identical, independent car race games.  
In each race, you will able to bet up to the full amount that 
you earned, or invest up to the full amount in the engine quality of your car.</li>
<li> Top up your winnings by playing a "guess the winner" game.</li>
<li> Complete a short demographics questionnaire while we prepare your payout.</li>
</ul>

<p> Money values that you see on the screen are real Australian dollar values. 
However, the final payout you receive from participating in this experiment will be based mainly on 
the results of ONE of the six car races. 
Which race is paid out will be determined randomly after the races are complete.
The remainder of your payout will be based on your performance in the "guess the winner" game.
</p>
 
<p>Thank you for your participation. We hope you enjoy this
experiment! If you have any questions, please raise your hand.</p>

<p></p>

<p>
<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>
</p>

<p align='left'>
Please enter your 3-digit participant number here: 
<span width="200px" align='left'>
<input type='text' name='number' value=''> <br>
</span>
#if ( $error.number )
<br><font color='#ff0000;'>Oops, that's the wrong number.  We are looking for your PARTICIPANT number.  Please try again.</font>
#end
</p>
<p>
<input type='submit' name='submit' value='Continue'>
</p>

<!--  starting values for a few variables, can be changed for testing -->
<!-- timerelax time for the button on the relax state to appear (in ms, default = 300000) -->
<input type='hidden' name='timerelax' value='3000' >

<!-- timerealeffort total time for the realeffort task, (in ms. default = 600000 = 10 min) -->
<input type='hidden' name='timerealeffort' value='600000' >
<!-- repayout payout for each re problem solved (and for the 20 sec interval), (in $, default = 0.1) -->
<input type='hidden' name='repayout' value='0.4' >


#parse("oetinvest/footer.vm")
